description:
Kei`ichiro learns that a kiss from a virgin will break the curse open him and asks Kiriko and Chiharu for a kiss.  But his disregard for their feelings ruins the mood.  Meanwhile, Otomi tells Kiriko the secret behind Kei`ichiro`s virginity curse.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fin de l’été à Nagasaki, le soir du lâcher de lanternes
Later Summer in Nagasaki, on the Night the Lanterns Float
Nagasaki Banka, Toronagashi no Yoru ni
長崎晩夏, 灯籠流しの夜に
